description: Stable and supportive, with tons of grip in a race-weight package. A tapered Apex insert in the casing increases grip when cornering and braking, decreases rolling resistance and increases puncture resistance. Woven aramid fibres also increases air retention, puncture protection and cut resistance – all good things when you're trying to get down a mountain as fast as possible.Hard-biting side knobs are bolstered by an angled structural base to help support knobs in high-speed cornering situations.Sipes on the knob surfaces improves traction.Ramped, shorter centre knobs make for a fast-rolling tire.Dual-compound construction offers unsurpassed cornering grip and increased straight-line durability.Dual-Ply Apex Aramid Reinforced casing improves support and puncture protection.True 2.35in width optimized for modern wide rims (24–31mm internal width).Tubeless ready.
name: e*thirteen LG1 DH All-Terrain Race 2.35" Tire
